Comment:        * https://cert.microsoft.com.
Comment:
Comment:        For SPAM and other abuse issues, such as Microsoft Accounts, please contact:
Comment:        * abuse@microsoft.com.

Comment:        * secure@microsoft.com.

Comment:        * msndcc@microsoft.com
